2019-02-10

β-NMR unabridged

Here is my attempt to compile an unabridged collection of β-NMR publications by the UBC/TRIUMF group. This is partially motivated by the fact that the lists at bnmr.triumf.ca are both incomplete and outdated, making it laborious to find the missing work, especially you are unfamiliar with the ~15 years of literature. My hope is rectify this. I also feel that the presentation at bnmr.triumf.ca could be improved, too. The layout here just copies that of my own publications, but I may experiment with fancier styles for this “catalog” (e.g., a timeline).

2019-02-03

Hyperfine coupling units

This is a test of displaying math in html. The content is based on: W. A MacFarlane, “Hyperfine coupling in “kilogauss per µB” (Mar. 2007). The original document can be found here.

This website is an experiment. The hypothesis is I will have some fun and learn a few things along the way.
